description.narrative: The objective of the project is to extend the national grid to supply electricity to 335 rural towns and villages and improve the national electricity access rate from 17% to 20% in 2011 in to promote socioeconomic development in the rural areas.

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire
